column4: next question - i've been developing a web site on my local box that uses css, javascript, php (5.03) and mysql (4.19). In order to test it, I've been uploading to my web host (a linux box).  Do I have to install Apache to get php and mysql to work?
i havn't tried it but to me it seems like http://www.lighttpd.net/ could be easier to setup than apache
